title: Favorite font for logo use.
content:
Share your favorites here.

Some of mine are

Daxline Pro  
Helvetica  
Gotham
author: jfldesign

comments.content: The one that annoys my enemies.
The one nobody else should know... ;-)
My company has recently discovered THE font that makes any kind of logo a guaranteed success. And that font is ... er ... um ..oO%&|ð#§$\*\<^@€{CARRIER LOST###
I guess this was a stupid question lol
Nah...we're just having fun. Don't mind us! :-)

We all use Papyrus, Harington, Impact or Arial Black when ever possible. When all the planets align just right, we can use Comic Sans.

& to be serious, I don't think it is possible to have a favourite. or at least, it is probably advisable not to .(IMHP). Your favourite has to be what works for a given project.
